Lab Panel

Chat with an AI research agent that's grounded in your sources. Get recommendations with transparent reasoning and full citations.

latticelab.io

LangGraph Research Agent

Powered by LangGraph for multi-step reasoning. The agent searches your sources, synthesizes findings, and provides recommendations—all with transparent thinking traces.

  • Multi-step reasoning for complex questions
  • Visible thinking steps and reasoning traces
  • Source retrieval before response generation

Grounded Recommendations

Every recommendation cites specific chunks from your sources. No hallucinations—just verifiable claims with full provenance.

  • Numbered inline citations [1], [2], [3]
  • Click citations to see source context
  • Verify claims against original documents

Conversation Extraction

Turn chat discussions into structured scenarios. Lattice extracts requirements, constraints, and preferences from your conversation.

  • Extract workload type and SLO requirements
  • Identify budget and compliance constraints
  • Create scenarios from natural discussion

Smart Prompts

Context-aware prompt suggestions help you get the most from your research. @ mentions let you reference specific sources in your questions.

  • Suggested prompts based on workspace state
  • @ mentions for source references
  • Multi-line input with Shift+Enter

Research with Confidence

Get AI-powered analysis grounded in your sources with transparent reasoning.
